sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"现代的，当代的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: modern, contemporary, current, recent, present, up-to-date
means: modern ： 指现代或近代，时期可长可短。也可指新颖、时髦的。
contemporary ： 仅指当今这个时代，不涉及任何过去的时代。但可表示不同的人或物存在于同一时代。
current ： 指目前存在和发生的。
recent ： 表示新近的，最近的，时间的长短依据所修饰的人或物而定。
present ： 是这些词中语气最强的一个。指现在正发生、起作用的。
up-to-date ： 一般用于非正式场合，指很时新、能反映当前的最新发展。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"趋势，倾向"之意。
means: trend ： 指事物发展总的方向、倾向或趋势。
tendency ： 指固有或习得的倾向性，强调没有外来的影响或干扰。
current ： 指向某一方面发展或在趋向中行动。

word_mean: 电流：沿导体流动的电流，由二点之间的电位差造成，电位差以伏特度量。电流大小决定于电位差和电阻，以安培度量。电流量以库仑度量之
current-meter 利用转子的旋转频率和周围流体局部速度有函数关系的仪表。

sentence.Network_cn: 现行雇佣法要变，要奖勤罚懒。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the adjective sense 'running, flowing'): from Old French corant 'running', from courre 'run', from Latin currere 'run'

encyclopedia.content: current可以表示为函数的符号，也可以表示为英语单词。或者可以理解为计算机操作命令。

entry.def: A current is a steady and continuous flowing movement of some of the water in a river, lake, or sea.

example.ex: Under normal conditions, the ocean currents of the tropical Pacific travel from east to west...
example.tran: 在正常情况下，太平洋的热带洋流自东向西流。

example.ex: The couple were swept away by the strong current.
example.tran: 这对夫妻被巨大的水流卷走了。

entry.def: A current is a steady flowing movement of air.

example.ex: I felt a current of cool air blowing in my face.
example.tran: 我觉得脸上有一阵冷风吹过。

entry.def: An electric current is a flow of electricity through a wire or circuit.

example.ex: A powerful electric current is passed through a piece of graphite.
example.tran: 给一块石墨通入强电流。

entry.def: A particular current is a particular feeling, idea, or quality that exists within a group of people.

example.ex: Each party represents a distinct current of thought...
example.tran: 每个党派代表一种不同的思潮。

example.ex: A strong current of nationalism runs through ideology and politics in the Arab world.
example.tran: 一股强烈的民族主义思潮涌入阿拉伯世界的思想体系和政治体系。

entry.tran: 现时的;当前的;进行中的
entry.def: Current means happening, being used, or being done at the present time.

example.ex: The current situation is very different to that in 1990...
example.tran: 当前的形势与1990年截然不同。

example.ex: He plans to repeal a number of current policies...
example.tran: 他计划废除一些当前的政策。

entry.def: Ideas and customs that are current are generally accepted and used by most people.

example.ex: Current thinking suggests that toxins only have a small part to play in the build up of cellulite...
example.tran: 目前普遍认为，毒素对皮下脂肪团堆积影响不大。

example.ex: This custom was still current in the late 1960s.
example.tran: 这种习俗在20世纪60年代末仍然很普遍。

means.word_mean: 1. a flow of electricity through a conductor;
2. a steady flow (usually from natural causes);

sentences.sentence: "the raft floated downstream on the current"

means.word_mean: 3. dominant course (suggestive of running water) of successive events or ideas;

sentences.sentence: "two streams of development run through American history"

means.word_mean: 1. occurring in or belonging to the present time;

stems_affixes.word_buile: curr跑,发生,快速做……+ent……的→跑的→流动[的]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 正在发生的, 偶然发生的
stems_affixes.word_buile: occurrence[[n.发生,出现,事件,发生的事情]]男→adj.正在发生的, 偶然发生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一再发生的;复发的,反复出现的
stems_affixes.word_buile: recur[v.[尤指不好的事]一再发生;重现]+ent……的→recurrent一再发生的
concur[v.意见相同,一致,互助]+ent……的→concurrent同时发生的
curr跑,发生,快速做……+ency表名词→流通货币[跑来跑去的钱]
curr跑,发生,快速做……+ent……的→跑的→流动[的]
curr跑,发生,快速做……+iculum表名词→学生跑来跑去的[依据]→课程表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发生,出现,事件,发生的事情
stems_affixes.word_buile: occur[v.发生,出现;存在;想起,想到]+ence表名词→occurrence发生,出现

Sentence.sentence: The question of whether our government should promote science and technology or the liberal arts in higher education isn't an either/or proposition(命题),although the current emphasis on preparing young Americans for STEM（science, technology, engineering, maths）-related fields can make it seem that way.
What I mean by that is the current perspective of the digital textbook is it's an exact copy of the print book.
Inkling CEO Matt Maclnnis explains that the problem with Course Smart's current digital textbooks is that they have to be revised repeatedly

sentences.en: They suggested measures to overcome current difficulties.
sentences.cn: 他们提出了克服目前困难的措施。

means.word_mean: 通用的, 通行的, 被普遍接受的

sentences.en: This word is no longer in current use.
sentences.cn: 这个字已经不再通用了。

sentences.en: The swimmer was swept away by the current.
sentences.cn: 那个游泳的人被激流卷走了。

sentences.en: This button switches the current on.

means.word_mean: 趋向, 趋势, 倾向

sentences.en: The adventure changed the whole current of his life.
sentences.cn: 那场奇遇改变了他人生的方向。

jushi.english: Long ago it was a current belief that the earth was flat.
jushi.chinese: 很久以前，人们普遍认为地球是扁的。

jushi.english: They suggested measures to overcome current difficulties.
jushi.chinese: 他们提出了克服目前困难的措施。

jushi.english: Various customs are current among the national minorities.
jushi.chinese: 少数民族中流传着不同的风俗。
